title: Message to the Central New York Conference of the Methodist Episcopal Church.
text:
My dear Mr. Hebblethwaite:

Thank you for your telegram of October 1st, conveying the resolution adopted by the Central New York Conference of the Methodist Episcopal Church at its recent meeting. I appreciate your wiring. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. R. C. Hebblethwaite, Secretary, Central New York Conference, Methodist Episcopal Church, Oneida, New York ]
